SELECT COUNT(CONTAINER_ID) FROM TB_CONTAINER
CONTAINER_ADDRESS LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{searchName}, '%')
CONTAINER_STATUS LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{searchName}, '%')
CONTAINER_APPROVAL_STATUS LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{searchName}, '%')

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY C.CONTAINER_CREATED ASC) AS ROW_NUM, C.CONTAINER_ID, C.CONTAINER_ADDRESS, C.CONTAINER_SIZE, C.CONTAINER_STATUS, C.CONTAINER_APPROVAL_STATUS, C.CONTAINER_CREATED, O.OWNER_COMPANY_NAME FROM TB_CONTAINER C INNER JOIN TB_OWNER O ON C.CONTAINER_OWNER_ID = O.OWNER_ID
CONTAINER_ADDRESS LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{searchName}, '%')
CONTAINER_STATUS LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{searchName}, '%')
CONTAINER_APPROVAL_STATUS LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{searchName}, '%')
ORDER BY CONTAINER_CREATED DESC LIMIT ${startRowNum}, ${pageSize}

SELECT C.CONTAINER_ID, C.CONTAINER_OWNER_ID, C.CONTAINER_NAME, C.CONTAINER_ADDRESS, C.CONTAINER_LATITUDE, C.CONTAINER_LONGITUDE, C.CONTAINER_CONTENTS, C.CONTAINER_CONTENTS_TEXT, C.CONTAINER_SIZE, C.CONTAINER_PRICE, C.CONTAINER_STATUS, C.CONTAINER_APPROVAL_STATUS, F.CONTAINER_FILE_ID, F.CONTAINER_FILE_CONTAINER_ID, F.CONTAINER_FILE_ORIGINAL_FILE_NAME, F.CONTAINER_FILE_STORED_FILE_NAME, F.CONTAINER_FILE_PATH, F.CONTAINER_FILE_EXTNS_NM, F.CONTAINER_FILE_SIZE, O.OWNER_NM FROM TB_CONTAINER C INNER JOIN TB_OWNER O ON C.CONTAINER_OWNER_ID = O.OWNER_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CONTAINER_FILE F ON C.CONTAINER_ID = F.CONTAINER_FILE_CONTAINER_ID WHERE C.CONTAINER_ID = #{containerId}

SELECT C.CONTAINER_ID, C.CONTAINER_OWNER_ID, C.CONTAINER_NAME, C.CONTAINER_ADDRESS, C.CONTAINER_LATITUDE, C.CONTAINER_LONGITUDE, C.CONTAINER_CONTENTS, C.CONTAINER_CONTENTS_TEXT, C.CONTAINER_SIZE, C.CONTAINER_PRICE, C.CONTAINER_STATUS, C.CONTAINER_APPROVAL_STATUS FROM TB_CONTAINER C WHERE C.CONTAINER_OWNER_ID = #{containerOwnerId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_CONTAINER ( CONTAINER_ID, CONTAINER_NAME, CONTAINER_ADDRESS, CONTAINER_LATITUDE, CONTAINER_LONGITUDE, CONTAINER_CONTENTS, CONTAINER_CONTENTS_TEXT, CONTAINER_SIZE, CONTAINER_PRICE, CONTAINER_STATUS, CONTAINER_APPROVAL_STATUS, CONTAINER_OWNER_ID ) VALUES ( #{containerId}, #{containerName}, #{containerAddr}, #{containerLatitude}, #{containerLongitude}, #{containerContents}, #{containerContentsText}, #{containerSize}, #{containerPrice}, #{containerStatus}, #{containerApprovalStatus}, #{containerOwnerId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_CONTAINER SET CONTAINER_NAME = #{containerName}, CONTAINER_SIZE = #{containerSize}, CONTAINER_PRICE = #{containerPrice}, CONTAINER_ADDRESS = #{containerAddr}, CONTAINER_LATITUDE = #{containerLatitude}, CONTAINER_LONGITUDE = #{containerLongitude}, CONTAINER_CONTENTS = #{containerContents}, CONTAINER_CONTENTS_TEXT = #{containerContentsText} WHERE CONTAINER_ID = #{containerId}
